article.headline: Texas A&amp,M-Corpus Christi 69, Lamar 60
article.story: CORPUS CHRISTI, Texas -- Kevin Palmer scored 26 points, had five rebounds and dished out four assists to lead Texas A&M-Corpus Christi past Lamar, 69-60 on Wednesday night. The Islanders (16-14, 10-5 Southland) never trailed in the game and led by as many as 16 points with 4:07 remaining in the second half. Demond Watt had 12 rebounds and nine points. The Islanders outrebounded Lamar (15-14, 6-9) 44-23. Brandon McThay scored 22 points while Ashton Hall added 12 for Lamar. Lamar gave up four first-half 3-pointers and entered the half down 29-22.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
